category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: dOOv
project.desc: Provides fluent API for typesafe domain model validation and mapping. It uses annotations, code generation and a type safe DSL to make bean validation and mapping fast and easy.

category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: Dozer
project.desc: Mapper that copies data from one object to another using annotations and API or XML configuration.

category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: JMapper
project.desc: Uses byte code manipulation for lightning-fast mapping. Supports annotations and API or XML configuration.

category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: MapStruct
project.desc: Code generator that simplifies mappings between different bean types, based on a convention-over-configuration approach.

category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: ModelMapper
project.desc: Intelligent object mapping library that automatically maps objects to each other.

category.name: Bean Mapping
project.name: reMap
project.desc: Lambda and method handle-based mapping which requires code and not annotations if objects have different names.
